metadata.title: CVE-2021-21225 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.85allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
